PerfectNetExp.abs: ...沿着大洋路小径漫步时，阳光从扶疏的绿大洋路(greatoceanroad)叶间透出，洒下点点金光。大洋路的梅尔巴峡谷的环境相当类似希尔布鲁克林区(sherbrookeforest)和其它有琴鸟(lyrebird)分布的区域，让人不禁期待能在大洋路此地看到琴鸟的芳踪。不过，可惜的是，大洋路根本没有琴鸟，其原因很可能是因为大洋路北方的玄武岩平原过于干燥贫瘠，断绝了琴鸟从澳洲东岸至大洋路奥特.

means.word_mean: 1. Australian bird that resembles a pheasant; the courting male displays long tail feathers in a lyre shape

auth_sentence.content: Superb lyrebird Superb lyrebirds are famed for their extraordinary ability to mimic.

auth_sentence.content: Marvellous mimic Life of Birds The superb lyrebird reproduces the sounds of the forest.

auth_sentence.content: It's a wildlife highlight in which the lyrebird shows off his extraordinary impersonation skills.
